TopicTitle: Its now monday. Where is KSP 1.0?!

Articles.Content:
Hi,

This is a test...for the next 60 seconds I need to find out what time it is; wait...even what day it is.

Now this would be possible if the server was up....LOL...Ugh !

Waits for KSP 1.0 ...

Cmdr Zeta

is there at least a "patch notes" thread for 1.0 somewhere that we can at least satiate ourselves with while we wait?

edit: *Official* notes thread

> 
> More like a New Year's Eve party with too many clocks, all set to different times. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

No... It's a New Year's Eve party with too much hype... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> No... It's a New Year's Eve party with too much hype... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Sounds like Y2K...
.. or they could just not release the game halfway into monday.. if it were up sooner, it could have balanced server load. Expect me to spam refresh in the next little bit.
My "compressed work week" starts in 12 minutes. So, for me, KSP 1.0 day is in 96 hours. No spoilers, please! Mwahahaha...
Yeah, i am getting impatient, now, too. Esp. cause i am watching a documentary about the U2 and SR71 right now... itchitchitchitchitch

> 
> Yeah, i am getting impatient, now, too. Esp. cause i am watching a documentary about the U2 and SR71 right now... itchitchitchitchitch

Who are you? 

On a more appropriate note soon tm. But my guess is on 18 GMT since that's the time stream releases new games

> 
> I'd just like to point out that it'll only be Monday for another 2 and half hours over here.

Still 11 hours of Monday left for Squad.
Welp, its officially Tuesday.

> 
> Welp, its officially Tuesday.

In your wacky land 

In the real world its still Monday!

direct buyers, 

how do we supposed to update to 1.0 with this server migration thing?

[**Maxmaps** @Maxmaps](https://twitter.com/Maxmaps) Ã‚Â· [18m 18 minutes ago](https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/592718164007452673) Website goes up when the build goes up. [#**Kerbalcoutdown**](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Kerbalcoutdown?src=hash) [#**NotMuchLongerNow**](https://twitter.com/hashtag/NotMuchLongerNow?src=hash)

Ricardo, per twitch stream, Maxmaps said on twitter that the website will be up when 1.0 is out, so I'm thinking same time website is up, 1.0 will be out ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

edit, ninja'd ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T16:16:51Z" title="04/27/2015 04:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by rottielover**

> 
> Ricardo, per twitch stream, Maxmaps said on twitter that the website will be up when 1.0 is out, so I'm thinking same time website is up, 1.0 will be out ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Well, of course. They wouldn't release it to steam only. The update simply cannot be released while the website is down.
Well, the website is up, just showing that info about server migration. Which is, technically, a website.
![4876654485780_f5.jpg](http://s4.noelshack.com/uploads/images/4876654485780_f5.jpg)
Steam DB says previous build has been updated, release imminent!

Maybe it's means nothing but something is moving on steam database

[https://steamdb.info/app/220200/history/](https://steamdb.info/app/220200/history/)
Ya. Minutes, not hours.
Just finishing up at work, short train journey and KSP waiting when I get home... hopefully ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Its released!
Lies! Steamdb says still on the scratchpad!
4 hours till I get home from work.. I hope it's released then!

Gah! I get a half-day at work because water got into an electrical panel during a storm last weekend, and KSP is still not out yet! What a waste of a sent-home day!

And no, I had nothing to do with the malfunction.

The hyped-up wait is killin me!
